response.overview: It's like the USSR of the 1980s, or Russia of the 1990s. An ordinary Soviet engineer always has a busy day, the host of the survival show "Die or Die" finds deadly dangers in the middle zone, two rocker friends are torn between their love of music and alcohol addiction, another brave journalist brings everyone to light and investigates the activities of the Iron Sleeves criminal gang in the crime-mystery show "The Riddle of the Hole." Sometimes, it's a simple worker named Igor Natalyevich Katamaranov who appears to them all.
response.title: Внутри Лапенко
